# ChangeLog

## v4.2.2
* Fix: error with status code as 0, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4287

## v4.2.1
* Made log levels tolerant to non-string value that can come from config bean, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3646

## v4.2.0
* Added config-bean configuration to update logging levels at runtime, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3646

## v4.1.0
* Typescript support for logging-inc module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3640

## v4.0.4
* Fixed: logging-inc cause EventEmitter leak warning, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2761

## v4.0.3
* fixing circular load of config

## v4.0.2
* Fixed jest test failure to the  4.0.1. release

## v4.0.1
* Node 2653, using async to load module-config-inc

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.1.15
* Fixed: should not include log events into transaction that was closed.

## v0.1.14
* Fixed: logging of warning with error object should produce status > 0 in CAL.
